hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin Zaid said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'The area between my house and my Minbar is one of the gardens of Paradise

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ مَسْجِدِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَالصَّلاَةِ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of The Prophet's Masjid And Praying Therein
